name: Jump Play Rewind
description:
JUMP PLAY REWIND

Very simple platformer where the only control you have is "Jump" with the spacebar.
Hit the "Play", "Rewind" and "Inverse" boxes to change direction.

Hope you like it!

Shout out to Brackeys <3

Started learning Unity about 2 months ago and Brackeys Youtube channel is the reason. What better hommage than to try make a game for his jam :D

Anyways. Thank you Brackeys and i hope you'll keep the channel going for a long time.

List of assets used. Thank you very much everyone for making it available for people like me :)

  • Jump sound effect - Zapsplat.com
  • Hurt sound effect - HaelDB @ OpenGameArt.Org
  • Background music - Rezoner @ OpenGameArt.Org
  • Heart pickup sound effect - Little Robot Sound Factory @ OpenGameArt.Org
  • Font "3 by 5 Pixel Font" - asciimario @ FontStruct

Sorry, i tried to export more builds but apparently my version of Unity didn't have the mods and i just didn't have time to figure it out. Next time i'll try provide more support for multiple platforms :)
